seo_title: Lars Walraevens - Web developer and designer
seo_description: Lars Walraevens is a web developer and designer in region Antwerp. Here you can find more information about his expertise in web development and his portfolio
hero_tooltip_music: Deathcore & metal music is what I vibe to! ðŸ¤˜
hero_tooltip_gaming: I play lots of video games ðŸŽ®
section_about_skills_description: Mostly I like learning by doing, this is personally the best way to improve my skills. I'm eager to learn new things and technologies so I constantly try to find out new and fun stuff.
section_about_motivation_description1: One of my favorite things about front-end development is the ability to bring beautiful designs to life. Seeing a well-crafted design or cool features is like a call to action for me - I can't wait to jump in and start building. As a front-end web developer, I am passionate about writing maintainable code and continuously improving my skills.
section_about_motivation_description2: In my projects I like to pay attention to the UX and UI aspects of a website. Namely, I look for a pleasant user experience for visitors.
section_about_skills_hobbies: Developing, fitness, gaming, flying my drone, ...
section_projects_description: The projects below are projects that I have worked on with great pride and that I would like to share with you.
section_contact_description: If you're interested in connecting with me or have any questions, feel free to send me an email. I'll get back to you as promptly as possible!
main_404_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
project_sethub_description: Sethub is a social platform made for gamers and streamers. With Sethub you create a profile so that you can share your ultimate gaming profile page with your friends and family.
project_autinoom_description: Autinoom was in need of a fresh and modern website, so I took the initiative to create a wireframe design for the new site. Through my efforts, the wireframe design evolved into a stunning new WordPress website that effectively met their needs.
project_waarisdegrens_description: On behalf of KdG, we have developed a website where visitors can vote whether a certain situation crosses 'the border' or not. The project is developed with a mobile-first approach.
project_sonar_description: Sonar Events is an innovative ticketing platform designed for event organizers. With our user-friendly dashboard, organizers can quickly and easily set up their event page and publish it to our website for seamless ticket sales. Our platform streamlines the process, making it easy for attendees to purchase tickets with just a few clicks.
project_zmadstudios_description: Vince De Groot's small business was due to an upgrade to their website, I helped him out by creating a new website for him, I took the opportunity to expand my skill set and learn a thing or two about working the framework VueJS.
section_about_other_description1: Sometimes you find these nice tools/packages that you just love using while developing. Therefor I think it's cool if I'd share them with you. PS: for more, check my Github stars!
